front.title: Layer Two Tunneling Protocol 'L2TP' Management Information Base

abstract.t: This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in TCP/IP-based internets. In particular, it defines objects for managing networks using Layer 2 Tunneling Protocol. This memo specifies a MIB module in a manner that is both compliant to the SNMPv2 SMI, and semantically identical to the peer SNMPv1 definitions.
